U

UP - game.Directions
 
update() - Method in class game.view.Grid
Update method, which is called regularly by the RunController and updates the current tiles
update() - Method in class game.view.GUI.PlayPanel
 
update() - Method in class game.view.Tile
Updates the animation (60 times a second) depending on the direction the tile moves (if it moves) and if it merges with another tile
update() - Method in class game.view.ViewManager
Calls update methods of grid and PlayPanel to make animations
